detail.app_languages: Simplified Chinese, English, Japanese, German, Spanish, French, Italian, Korean, Portuguese, Thai, Traditional Chinese
detail.app_release_note:
-improved lighting on ball in all environments
-prep work for voip fix. (it's technically in the app, and you can test it if the other person is on the same version, but I need to get everyone on the new voip system and then I'll flip a server-side switch to flip everyone over)
-for 2d mode, updated log flush to instant (from 10 seconds). some users were asking for this change for some live shot metrics analysis via logs. 
-for 2d mode, Join Room feature is now available if you click on a user in your friends list, and they are in a room
-icon on right of friend list row shows paddle when user is in room
-some performance fixes for the voip related patch. 
-peripherals now get pulled from a remote location so future peripherals can be added or updates pushed to those already there without a game update. If you know anyone who has had peripheral changes pending update, please send them to me. I can do it now the way I wanted to do it before.
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO Neo3, PICO 4, PICO 4 Pro, PICO Neo3 Pro, PICO Neo3 Eye
